alert.note: Alert for Coosa; Elmore; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 6:07PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Elmore, southwestern Tallapoosa and southeastern Coosa Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 606 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eastern Lake Martin, or 9 miles east of Equality, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Tallassee, Dadeville, Eclectic, Jacksons` Gap, Martin Dam, Santuck, Southern Lake Martin, Dexter, Eastern Lake Martin, Liberty City, Western Lake Martin, Tallapoosa City, Kowaliga Bridge, Wind Creek State Park, Still Waters Resort, Northern Lake Martin, Fishpond, Central and Dare Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Birmingham.
